page: AR51013: Energy And Environmental Systems For Green Buildings

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Embodied energy rating of building materials; Green building rating systems; Carbon credits - rating for integrated building systems ; Management of water resources in Arid regions; Bio-meteorological studies of individual building canyons and urban built forms at local, neighborhood and regional scales; Thermal comfort studies in enclosed, semi-open and open spaces ;
page: AR51013: Energy And Environmental Systems For Green Buildings
